alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 2:23PM EDT until July 28 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR LAWRENCE...SOUTH CENTRAL LAWRENCE...SOUTHERN CABELL... NORTHWESTERN MINGO...WESTERN LINCOLN...NORTHWESTERN LOGAN AND WAYNE COUNTIES... At 223 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Lynn Lake, or near Wayne, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Louisa, Wayne, Hamlin, Chesapeake, Proctorville, Blaine, Beech Fork State Park, Yatesville Lake State Park, Barboursville, Kenova, Ceredo, Fort Gay, Ranger, Harts, Martha, Gill, Ulysses, East Lynn Lake, and Charley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
